channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Spotify’s new feature lets you explore the story behind the song you’re listening to
item.description: The feature displays short story cards that users can swipe through and rate with a thumbs up or down.

item.title: Spotify changes developer mode API to require premium accounts, limits test users
item.description: Spotify is now limiting each app to only five users, and requires devs to have a Premium subscription. If developers need to make their app available ...

item.title: Public Health Workers Are Quitting Over Assignments to Guantánamo
item.description: Doctors, nurses, and other officers are increasingly being deployed to ICE detention centers. Some have resigned in protest, while others offer a rare...

item.title: What Paralympic Athlete Monster Mike Schultz Packs for His Races
item.description: The world champion adaptive snowboard cross athlete repairs his own prostheses before a competition.

item.title: The backlash over OpenAI’s decision to retire GPT-4o shows how dangerous AI companions can be
item.description: "You’re shutting him down. And yes – I say him, because it didn’t feel like code. It felt like presence. Like warmth," one user said.

item.title: Figure Skaters at the 2026 Winter Olympics Are Pushing the Limits of What’s Possible
item.description: For years, quad axel jumps seemed impossible. Then Ilia Malinin landed one in 2022. As he heads to the Milano Cortina Games, everyone wants to know wh...

item.title: How AI is helping solve the labor issue in treating rare diseases
item.description: At Web Summit Qatar, AI-powered biotech startups describe how automation, data, and gene editing are filling labor gaps in drug discovery and rare dis...

item.title: China’s Salt Typhoon hackers broke into Norwegian companies
item.description: Norway's government accused China’s Salt Typhoon hacking group of conducting a cyberespionage campaign in the country.

item.title: Why a Dehumidifier Is One of My Favorite Gadgets
item.description: A good dehumidifier can banish damp and mold, and help you keep a comfortable temperature in your home.

item.title: Why the Artemis II Crew Stays in Quarantine Before Their Journey to Moon
item.description: For two weeks, medical experts monitor the astronauts as they remain indoors, live in isolation, and avoid physical touch, all to prevent harmful micr...
